channel.title: Genesis: The Art of Madness [Open RP]
channel.description:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/291996852860092416/299220282227425290/Gen.png
[Discord](https://discord.gg/2NRAsDd)
One important thing I must state before anything else...
**You do not have to read the entire game to start playing!**
I'm making this because of a [roleplay thread](http://blankmediagames.com/phpbb/viewtopic.php?f=25&t=12009) we have going on at the other forums I'm currently active on. I decided to bring the madness here, so have fun.
To join, all you have to do is make a character (Basic needs are Name, Sex, and Race. You can make up addition info as you go along if you want to.). Your character does not have to be a human, and you can control multiple characters at once if you'd like.
Also, rules of course:
* Everyone does not have to be in the same place at once. You can be in different places from other characters * Don't be a Fade with your characters * No demi-gods, Gods, or anyone who is godly in anyway. You cannot be all-powerful, all-versatile, and you cannot erase anyone from existence and no all-powerful demons. Nothing wrong with demons though. * You cannot attack souls. * No genocidal maniacs. Seriously, the last thing we want is someone killing everyone the moment they come along. Actually put effort into your characters. * This is a game with limitless possibilities. You can have your character face off 50 flying devil bunnies, or tame ghost dragons. You can even kill off your character and have a dramatic revival. Anything is possible in this world... **HOWEVER** This rule does not interfere with other rules, and you must consider them while using this knowledge. * Your character cannot do OP moves (such as the ability to kill 100 enemies per second or something) * Killing off other characters without permission is strictly prohibited. * Your formatting isn't restricted, but it is recommended that you type OOC comments in parenthesis, actions can be whatever you feel is comfortable. Personally, I use **_bold and italics_**, but you can do whatever you'd like. For characters, you can make a unique [color=#0000FF]color[/color] for them, or you can just type "Character: Text". Whatever you feel is best. * Anyone can continue the story. The first post made for it will always be canon (unless they take it back). Any other post that would [contradict](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W8QRExBfQhs) it is not canon (unless agreed on). * And finally, the most important rule, have fun!

item.title: Genesis: The Art of Madness [Open RP]
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
Runa struggles to keep the wind from dropping her. It’s quite hard with the man clinging at her arms.

Runa: Let go off my hand!
???: What? I don’t want to fall!
Runa: We’ll both fall if you don’t stop waving your legs like that! Can’t you help yourself?
???: Well, I can fly, but I don’t- oh!
Runa: THEN WHY DID YOU FELL ON THE FIRST PLACE.
???: Umm… I guess I forgot how to for a moment.

The man let go off her arms, looking slightly embarassed. He floats.

Read full topic
